mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN MILEAGE_CATEGORY = '자전거' THEN MILEAGE_SCORE END), 0) AS bikeTotal , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN MILEAGE_CATEGORY = '다회용기' THEN MILEAGE_SCORE END), 0) AS reuseTotal , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN MILEAGE_CATEGORY = '기타' THEN MILEAGE_SCORE END), 0) AS etcTotal FROM TB_MILEAGE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MILEAGE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY USER_ID
